name: Guess The Color
description:
A little mouse is stranded on an island paradise. Fortunately for her, this island is inhabited by a fox. To pass the time, the 2 animals decide to play a game...

A test game made in godot with most sprites designed in paint by myself (made in 5 min tho)

⚠️ Do not click on the "Home" button in the title screen, it'll make the game crash⚠️
